NAME: Richa Singh
ABOUT:
Richa Singh is working as an investment banking analyst for Hong Kong - Oil and Gas sector. She completed her PGDM in Finance from SP Jain Institute of Management and Research  in 2018. She has been a National Winner of 2 coveted competitions, held across Tier-1 B-Schools of India.

She has been consistently good in Academics and was awarded CBSE merit certificate for excellent performance in Business Studies board exam. 

She has a bachelors degree in Commerce from Shri Ram College of Commerce and a masters degree with a major in Finance from Delhi School of Economics. She has interned with UCO Bank as a credit Analyst in her under graduation. She was the event head of dance competition, conducted at university level and member of sponsorship team for 2 college fests. 

Having volunteered to teach orphans academics and life skills, she aims to become a socially sensitive manager with good interpersonal skills.

EDUCATION.Institute Name: S.P. Jain Institute of Management & Research

HONOR & AWARD.Title: Campus Winner of HSBC - The IB League'17
